com.excilys.cdb.model

Class Page

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.excilys.cdb.model.Page

  • public class Page
extends java.lang.Object
    Page is composed of :
    • a number of results per page
    • the total number of pages
    • a list of computer<\li>
    Author:
    sclaudet
